1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Sa'eed Al-Khudri said:"The Prophet was asked about doubts (concerning ablution) during prayer. He said: 'he should not leave until he hears a sound or detects an odor

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ وُضُوءَ إِلاَّ مِنْ حَدَثٍ
